CHAT.comment: this is the very first tape and it is short; 6:13 minutes; routines: knock-knock; I'm gonna tickle you.; animal sounds with what does Lady say; light; animal sounds again; breakfast request; you're gross; where's your shoe; comments from BW's transcription

u.a: 1.3 sec; D pulls tape on diaper
imploded; an animal sound he has learned
18 sec , D changing diaper , S chuckles several times
fast whisper; 26 sec silence , rustles , S chuckes as D tickles him
5.3 sec; S breathing , blowing on mike , drowns out beginning of D's next utterance
interrupted by tape being switched off at 2:31; 6 sec silence
S moving his head in response to light; 0.9 sec
takes in breath and ends with implosion
4.6 sec , S makes a small fussy sound
17.5 sec , S fusses a bit; S and D exchange bilabial babbles; silence
imploded; 3.1 sec; S makes 2 more small sounds
very low pitch; 9.5 sec , car goes by
11 sec: silence , 3 bangs , silence; tape OFF/ON at 3:54; 2 hollow thumps and silence
8.6 sec silence , clunk; S holds up his foot
smiling voice; 5.7 sec; clunk , then S throws his shoe
what he says when he throws something; 0.9 sec
14 sec , more bells , rustles , thumps , S makes 2 raspy sounds
sounds like gestalt of 'daddy xxx it'
tape OFF/ON at 6:05; 3 sec , S makes a sound
loud thump; end of side at 6:13
